Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12

When I change the border padding of windows 7 firefox(4.0 beta 12) the border graphics are not getting scaled as the must be on certain themes (doesn't listen to the dwm sizingmargins of the borders!)...

Any change that it is possible to change the border size manually or firefox will recognize the bordermargins?

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Install firefox 4.0 beta 12
2.Install a custom msstyles with custom sizingmargins at borders
3.Tada, firefox scales the borders wrong...
Actual Results:  
Scales the borders wrong and makes them distorted under different msstyles

Expected Results:  
Scale the borders by using the sizing margins from the current msstyles!
And use the right border width since the borders are thicker then they have to be...

No Addons or Themes in Firfox itself.
Used msstyles: http://dl.getdropbox.com/u/4281191/Wave.msstyles
